name: END_CAP Agent Factory - OpenAI Integration
description: Automatically delivers PRDs from ChatGPT/OpenAI conversations to END_CAP Agent Factory and triggers Devin AI deployment workflow.

secrets.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
secrets.description: OpenAI API key for ChatGPT integration

secrets.name: ENDCAP_API_URL
secrets.description: END_CAP Agent Factory API URL (default: http://localhost:8000)

tools.name: create_prd_from_conversation
tools.description: Extract PRD from OpenAI conversation and format for END_CAP

parameters.conversation: string - The conversation text from ChatGPT/OpenAI

tools.name: deliver_prd_to_endcap
tools.description: Deliver extracted PRD to END_CAP Agent Factory

parameters.prd: object - The PRD data extracted from conversation

parameters.task_id: string - The task ID from END_CAP

tools.name: get_endcap_status
tools.description: Check if END_CAP Agent Factory is running and ready
